method.name: SetTextBackgroundDrawable
method.comment: Set the drawable that appears behind the Action text labels textBackgroundDrawable: the desired drawable Return type: @return:the QuickActionView

method.name: SetTextPaddingRight
method.comment: Set the text right padding for the Action labels textPaddingRight: the top padding in pixels Return type: @return:the QuickActionView

method.name: SetTextPaddingBottom
method.comment: Set the text bottom padding for the Action labels textPaddingBottom: the top padding in pixels Return type: @return:the QuickActionView

method.name: SetTextColor
method.comment: Set the text color for the Action labels textColor: the desired text color Return type: @return:the QuickActionView

method.name: SetIndicatorDrawable
method.comment: Set the indicator drawable (the drawable that appears at the point the user has long pressed indicatorDrawable: the indicator drawable Return type: @return:the QuickActionView

method.name: AddActions
method.comment: Add actions to the QuickActionView from the given menu resource id. menuId: menu resource id Return type: @return:the QuickActionView

method.name: Register
method.comment: Register the QuickActionView to appear when the passed view is long pressed view: the view to have long press responses Return type: @return:the QuickActionView

method.name: AddAction
method.comment: Adds an action to the QuickActionView action: the action to add Return type: @return:the QuickActionView

method.name: RemoveAction
method.comment: Remove an individual action from the QuickActionView actionId: the action id Return type: @return:the QuickActionView

method.name: SetActionConfig
method.comment: Set a custom configuration for the action with the given id config: the configuration to attach actionId: the action id Return type: @return:this QuickActionView

method.name: SetTextPaddingTop
method.comment: Set the text top padding for the Action labels textPaddingTop: the top padding in pixels Return type: @return:the QuickActionView

method.name: SetTextPaddingLeft
method.comment: Set the text left padding for the Action labels textPaddingLeft: the top padding in pixels Return type: @return:the QuickActionView

method.name: SetTypeface
method.comment: Set the typeface for the Action labels typeface: the desired typeface Return type: @return:the QuickActionView

method.name: SetScrimColor
method.comment: Set the scrim color (the background behind the QuickActionView) scrimColor: the desired scrim color Return type: @return:the QuickActionView

method.name: SetTextSize
method.comment: Set the text size for the Action labels textSize: the desired textSize (in pixels) Return type: @return:the QuickActionView

method.name: Unregister
method.comment: Unregister the view so that it can no longer be long pressed to show the QuickActionView view: the view to unregister

method.name: SetBackgroundColor
method.comment: Set the action's background color. If you want to have a pressed state, see {@link #setBackgroundColorStateList(ColorStateList)} backgroundColor: the desired background color Return type: @return:the QuickActionView

method.name: RemoveActions
method.comment: Removes all actions from the QuickActionView Return type: @return:the QuickActionView
